alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson; Jones; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baldwin, northern Wilkinson, north central Emanuel, Washington, northeastern Jones, northern Johnson and southern Jefferson Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1215 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Resseaus Crossroads to Deepstep to near Louisville, and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Sandersville, Gray, Louisville, Wrightsville, Irwinton, Wadley, Gordon, Davisboro, Tennille, Ivey, McIntyre, Harrison, Toomsboro, Bartow, Oconee, Deepstep, Riddleville, Midway-Hardwick, and Meriwether. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson; Jones; Washington; Wilkinson
